reviews.text: great clean station with lots of staff to help. toilets are clean and there's a few shops and cafes.    trains to most big cities in the region except manchester
Clean platforms. Some platforms have waiting rooms, but overall there is very little seating. Roofing is under renovation on one platform. They do have a cafe though.

It's a Good train station for Trainspotting Also There is lots of Places to go on the Trains like Matlock,Sheffield,London St pranas, Birmingham New Street,Cardiff cental,Doncaster,Newcastle,York.But Why are they Two Trains company's East Midlands and Crosscrounty Why can they be more?
Good facilities, helpful staff, lots of destinations available by train

14 year old daughter was travelling alone for the first time . Staff (think called Alia) let me through the barrier when I explained and also showed /explained to daughter all about the tickets  and had her using the barriers so she knew what to do . 
Well done . Above and beyond service .
